paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted two BRCA2 variants with associated patient and penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Two specific BRCA2 variants, c.8167G>C (p.Asp2723His) and c.1583del (p.Asn528fs), have been identified from individuals with a family history of breast cancer.

functional_data.summary: iPSC lines exhibit pluripotency and capability to differentiate into three germ layers.

variants.additional_notes: Variant associated with family history of breast cancer.
key_quotes: Germline pathogenic variants in the BRCA2 gene are strongly correlated with an elevated risk of developing breast cancer.
